paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the molecular determinants of hERG channel block by terfenadine and cisapride, focusing on specific mutations in the KCNH2 gene. However, it does not provide clinical or penetrance data for these variants.

challenges: The paper focuses on functional studies of mutations without providing clinical or penetrance data.
extraction_metadata.notes: The paper primarily discusses functional assays and does not include patient data or penetrance information for KCNH2 variants.
